process: Claims Management Process in Financial Services
description: End-to-end workflow for processing insurance/financial claims: intake, validation, investigation, decision, payment, notification, closure.

prompts.prompt: Register a new claim for John Smith, contact john.smith@email.com, policy AUTO-123, rear-end collision.
prompts.description: Tests claim registration with all required fields for a typical auto claim.

prompts.prompt: Start a health claim for Anne Lee, anne.lee@email.com, missing incident description.
prompts.description: Triggers claim registration with incomplete data to prompt for missing information.

prompts.prompt: Validate claim CLM-002 and identify missing or invalid fields.
prompts.description: Tests the validation agent's missing info detection and additional info request path.

prompts.prompt: Assign examiner for claim CLM-001 from auto examiner pool and begin investigation.
prompts.description: Tests examiner assignment and investigation initiation for a valid, complete claim.

prompts.prompt: Process payment for claim CLM-005, amount $350, account INVALID123, routing XXXXXXX.
prompts.description: Tests payment agentâ€™s error handling and guidance for invalid payment details.

prompts.prompt: Send an approval notification to alice.johnson@email.com for claim CLM-001.
prompts.description: Tests the notification agent's message generation for an approved claim outcome.
